casebody.data:
Timothy McKYER
v.
Fontella McKYER. No. 516P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. Marnite Shuford, for Timothy McKyer. Billie Ray Ellerbe, Charlotte, for Fontella McKyer.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th day of September 2003 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of March 2004."
